text: Nuwan Kulasekara is a Sri Lankan cricketer. He was born in Nittambuwa, Sri Lanka on July 22,1982. Kulasekara was once rated as the World's no 1 ODI bowler by the ICC in 2009. He also has the ability to swing the balls in first few overs. == References == == Other websites == * Nuwan Kulasekarafrom ESPN Cricinfo * Nuwan Kulasekara from CricBuzz Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers
title: Nuwan Kulasekara
